name: Lonk's Adventure
description: I'm the first and only truly non-linear game, with 100 different endings. Don't just wishlist me. I'm not that expensive... also, look at those reviews!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: SSE2 compatible instruction set Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0) compatible DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
